hero_sub_text: Unlock the MPCP by qualifying as a Master UnFranchise Owner
intro_text:
We’re thrilled to announce a powerful enhancement to the Management Performance Compensation Plan (MPCP) for UFOs in the US and Canada!

Qualify as a Master UnFranchise Owner (MUFO) and you can double your BV commissions from your 001 Business Development Center (BDC).

It’s now simpler and more rewarding than ever.
steps_title_text: How to Qualify as a Master UnFranchise Owner (MUFO) and Unlock Double BV Commissions

steps.heading_text: 1. Generate a total of 3,000 BV for the respective quarter.
steps.body_text: Product purchases must be from your paying UnFranchise ID or from a registered Preferred Customer’s paying ID.

steps.body_01_text: Personally sponsor 2 qualified UnFranchise Owners, OR
steps.body_02_text: Personally sponsor 1 qualified UnFranchise Owner & they personally sponsor 1 qualified UnFranchise Owner
steps.body_03_text: (New personally sponsored UnFranchise Owners must be enrolled in Autoship)

steps.body_text: Purchase 5 tickets to the next event, International Convention or Leadership School.

You must attend both major events, International Convention and Leadership School.

Program runs through: December 31

rewards_sub_text: (Double BV commissions will be awarded beginning the first day of the UFO’s unique Q Quarter)
rewards_body_text: This is your chance to maximize earnings in your UnFranchise Business. If you have questions or need support, please reach out to your team leader!
